description: A relatively new ransomware operation named Interlock attacks organizations worldwide, taking the unusual approach of creating an encryptor to target FreeBSD servers. [...]
title: Meet Interlock — The new ransomware targeting FreeBSD servers

description: Researchers have shown that it's possible to abuse OpenAI's real-time voice API for ChatGPT-4o, an advanced LLM chatbot, to conduct financial scams with low to moderate success rates. [...]
title: ChatGPT-4o can be used for autonomous voice-based scams
